== Upgrade Kubuntu from 16.04 or 17.10 to 18.04 ==

<<BR>>

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <#D2FCFF> '''Note: Upgrades from 16.04 LTS will not be enabled until a few days after the 18.04.1 release expected in late July or early August.
|}

<<BR>>

If you are using a Laptop ensure the following things are done.

You will need to:
* Ensure your laptop is connected to power.
* If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection.
* Ensure your current installation is updated.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

For Desktops:

You will need to:
* Ensure your current installation is updated.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

=== Ensure your laptop is connected to power ===

The upgrade should run uninterrupted.

=== If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection ===

The upgrade may change your wireless networking applications and drivers.

=== Ensure your current installation is updated ===

==== Run Plasma Discover ====

Use <alt> <F2> to bring up krunner, and type plasma-discover and select Discover

<nowiki>[[File:krunner.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Select Install Updates ====

<nowiki>[[File:discover.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Supply your password ====

<nowiki>[[File:authupdates.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Wait for updates to install ====

<nowiki>[[File:updating.png]]</nowiki>

----

==== Re-boot if suggested ====

----

=== Upgrade ===

If for some reason Discover does not offer you the upgrade to 18.04, then you can open Krunner, or Konsole (or other terminal), and run:

<pre>
kdesudo "do-release-upgrade -m desktop -f DistUpgradeViewKDE"
</pre>

<nowiki>[[File:do-upgrade.png]]</nowiki>

Again, sudo will ask for your password to proceed.

=== The Release Upgrade tool will be downloaded and started ===

18.04 introductory notes will be shown

Select Upgrade.

<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-notes.png]]</nowiki>

----

=== Allow the upgrade to start ===

<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-step1.png]]</nowiki>

Then Start Upgrade; it will download and install 18.04.

<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-step2.png]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-step3.png]]</nowiki>

----

=== Wait (approximately an hour) ===

Enjoy a cup of coffee.

----

=== Remove obsolete packages ===

Click '''Remove'''. 

<nowiki>[[File:remove-obsolete.png]]</nowiki>

----

=== Restart your computer ===

It will ask you to restart your computer. Ensure you have no unsaved work open and click Restart Now.

<nowiki>[[File:reboot.png]]</nowiki>

----

== Welcome to Kubuntu 18.04 LTS ==

Your computer should boot into Kubuntu 18.04 LTS, with the new Plasma 5.12 desktop

<nowiki>[[File:awesomeness.png]]</nowiki>
